title: Weird behave on font menu names
content:
Something strange happens to me. I have this simple structure:

MikeFontThn.otf ---\> MikeFont -- Thin (menu appareance)  
MikeFontRegular.otf ---\> MikeFont -- Regular (menu appareance)  
MikeFontBold.otf ---\> MikeFont -- Bold (menu appareance)

When I test them all together, there is no problem at menu name in Illustrator, Photoshop, Word, etc.  
But when I only install only one of them, (for example, the regular) the menu appear like my font is:

MikeFontRegular.otf ---\> Regular -- Regular (menu appareance)

Whats going on here?

Thanks a lot guys!
author: mikej
